articles.author: Rob Merrick
articles.title: Russian oligarchs in London to be hit with tough sanctions even if it hurts UK economy, Liz Truss vows - The Independent
articles.description: ‘We cannot favour short-term economic interests over the long-term survival of freedom and democracy in Europe’
articles.content:
Russian oligarchs in London will be hit with tough new sanctions to deter Moscow from invading Ukraine, even if it hurts the UK economy, Liz Truss says.

articles.title: Russia can choose negotiations or sanctions, Canada's defence minister says in Ukraine - CBC News
articles.description: Defence Minister Anita Anand arrived in a snowy Kyiv on Sunday and echoed the warnings of western allies about the looming threat of an invasion by Russia amid an increasingly frosty international deadlock over the crisis in eastern Europe.

articles.title: "Clear Message To Kremlin": UK Preps Big Troop Deployment In Europe - NDTV
articles.description: Britain is poised to offer NATO a "major" deployment of troops, weapons, warships and jets in Europe, Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced Saturday, to respond to rising "Russian hostility" towards Ukraine.
articles.content:
"This package would send a clear message to the Kremlin," Boris Johnson said.

articles.title: Is Infinix rolling out a phone with Dimensity 900 chipset and 5G? - TechCabal
